specification.description: Converts Markdown formatted text into HTML format.

implementation_plan.description: Define a function that takes Markdown formatted text as input.
Use the 'markdown' library to convert the Markdown text into HTML format.

specification.description: A module that integrates with the Stable Diffusion WebUI to create a photo of a baseball.

implementation_plan.description: Ensure that the Stable Diffusion WebUI is running on http://localhost:7860.
Write a Python script to interact with the Stable Diffusion WebUI API and generate an image of a baseball.
Test the script to ensure that it is able to successfully generate an image of a baseball.

specification.description: A module that allows users to create a custom cryptocurrency template for their WordPress site, complete with wallet integration and payment processing capabilities.
implementation_plan: Create a new WordPress plugin or theme module
Integrate the Cryptocurrency API to allow users to select their preferred cryptocurrency and wallet address
Develop a payment processing system that allows users to accept payments in cryptocurrency
Design a user-friendly interface for displaying cryptocurrency balances and transaction history
Test the template thoroughly to ensure compatibility with various browsers and devices

specification.description: Converts Markdown formatted text to HTML format.

implementation_plan.description: Define a function that takes Markdown formatted text as input.
Use the markdown library to convert the Markdown text to HTML format.

specification.description: A Python script that acts as an extension for AI interfaces, allowing the AI to search for various topics or information.

implementation_plan.description: Define a function that takes in a search query as input.
Use the requests library to send an HTTP request to a search engine API (e.g. Google Custom Search, Bing Search) with the search query as a parameter.
Parse the response using BeautifulSoup or another HTML parsing library to extract relevant information from the search results.
Return the extracted information to the AI interface for further processing or display.

integration_points: Nexus API endpoint for AI interfaces

specification.description: A module that allows for the creation of files based on user instructions.

implementation_plan.description: Create a function called 'create_file' that takes in parameters for the file name and content.
Use the 'os.path.exists' method to check if the file already exists. If it does, raise an error or prompt the user to choose a different file name.
Use the 'pathlib.Path.mkdir' method to create any necessary directories for the file path.
Open the file in write mode and use the 'write' method to write the specified content to the file.
